HomePage.title: MyProjects
HomePage.subtitle: The high-end portfolio builder for developers.

Landing.subtitle: The platform where developers showcase their best projects to the world. Build your professional portfolio and connect with opportunities.

carousel.title: Featured projects
carousel.subtitle: Discover the most popular projects from our community
carousel.empty: No published projects yet. Be the first!

about.title: Your professional portfolio in minutes
about.description: MyProjects is the perfect platform for developers who want to stand out. Showcase your projects, share your code, and build your personal brand as a developer.

showcase.title: Showcase your code
showcase.description: Present your projects with detailed descriptions, technologies used, and links to demos and repositories.

organize.title: Organize your work
organize.description: Keep all your projects organized in one place with an intuitive and easy-to-use dashboard.

share.title: Share globally
share.description: Get a unique URL for your profile and share it with recruiters, clients, or the community.

analytics.title: Analyze your impact
analytics.description: Know how many people view your projects, likes, and engagement statistics.

DashboardPreview.noBio: No bio. Add one in your profile.
DashboardPreview.uploadBannerDesc: Choose an image for your banner. Recommended 1500x500px.
DashboardPreview.noProjects: You don't have any projects yet
DashboardPreview.noProjectsDesc: Add your first project so it appears on your public profile and recruiters can see your work.

Profile.socialLinksDescription: Add your social media links to appear on your public profile.
